example[0]: Neil McMurtry, a one-time bus driver, is the lead singer.
definition[0]: a one-time event, payment etc happens once and is not part of a regular series of such events
example[1]: Lawyers face a one-off tax hit as a result of the tax changes.
example[2]: The company expects to take a one-time charge of $10.3 million  (=show it in its accounts) due primarily to restructuring.
